Saturn.description: The aspect of Saturn on {planet} brings delays, seriousness, and karmic pressure, requiring dedication and accountability for positive outcomes.

Mars.description: The aspect of Mars on {planet} adding aggression and urgency that need disciplined direction for constructive outcomes.

Jupiter.description: The aspect of Jupiter on {planet} provides wisdom, protection, and spiritual upliftment.

Moon.description: The aspect of Moon on {planet} enhances emotional sensitivity, intuition, and fluctuation.

Venus.description: The aspect of Venus on {planet} adds charm, harmony, and a desire for comfort.

Mercury.description: The aspect of Mercury on {planet} improves logic, speech, and analytical thinking.

Sun.description: The aspect of Sun on {planet} increases confidence, ego, and vitality.

Rahu.description: The aspect of Rahu on {planet} creates intensity, obsession, and illusion.

Ketu.description: The aspect of Ketu on {planet} brings detachment, spiritual awakening, and unpredictability.
